import _ from'lodash';import*as dnerojs from'@dnerolabs/dnero-js';import{DDropAddressByChainId}from'./index';var _require=require('@dnerolabs/dnc20-contract-metadata'),tokensByChainId=_require.tokensByChainId;var getTokenIconUrl=function getTokenIconUrl(fileName){if(_.isEmpty(fileName)){return null;}return"https://s3.us-east-2.amazonaws.com/assets.dnerochain.org/tokens/".concat(fileName);// return `https://assets.dnerochain.org/tokens/${fileName}`;
};var DneroAsset={id:'dnero',name:'Dnero',symbol:'DNERO',contractAddress:null,decimals:18,iconUrl:getTokenIconUrl('dnero.png'),balanceKey:'dnerowei'};var DTokenAsset={id:'dtoken',name:'Dnero Token',symbol:'DTOKEN',contractAddress:null,decimals:18,iconUrl:getTokenIconUrl('dtoken.png'),balanceKey:'dtokenwei'};var NativeAssets=[DneroAsset,DTokenAsset];var DDropAsset=function DDropAsset(chainId){var ddropAddress=DDropAddressByChainId[chainId];var DNC20Asset=null;if(ddropAddress){DNC20Asset={id:ddropAddress,name:'DDROP',symbol:'DDROP',contractAddress:ddropAddress,address:ddropAddress,decimals:18,iconUrl:getTokenIconUrl(_.get(tokensByChainId,[chainId,ddropAddress,'logo'])),balanceKey:ddropAddress};}return DNC20Asset;};var DefaultAssets=function DefaultAssets(chainId){var ddropAddress=DDropAddressByChainId[chainId];var DNC20Assets=[];var ddropAsset=DDropAsset(chainId);if(ddropAddress){DNC20Assets.push(ddropAsset);}return _.concat(NativeAssets,DNC20Assets);};var getAllAssets=function getAllAssets(chainId,tokens){var ddropAddress=DDropAddressByChainId[chainId];var tokenAssets=tokens.map(tokenToAsset);var tokenAssetsWithoutTdrop=_.filter(tokenAssets,function(asset){var _asset$contractAddres;return((_asset$contractAddres=asset.contractAddress)===null||_asset$contractAddres===void 0?void 0:_asset$contractAddres.toLowerCase())!==(ddropAddress===null||ddropAddress===void 0?void 0:ddropAddress.toLowerCase());});return _.concat(DefaultAssets(chainId),tokenAssetsWithoutTdrop);};var tokenToAsset=function tokenToAsset(token){var knownToken=tokensByChainId[dnerojs.networks.ChainIds.Mainnet][token.address]||tokensByChainId[dnerojs.networks.ChainIds.Testnet][token.address];return{id:token.address,name:token.symbol,symbol:token.symbol,contractAddress:token.address,decimals:token.decimals,iconUrl:knownToken?getTokenIconUrl(knownToken.logo):null,balanceKey:token.address};};export{DefaultAssets,DneroAsset,DTokenAsset,DDropAsset,tokenToAsset,getAllAssets};
